mapper.select:
select
from p_myproducttemp where BranchUserId = #{branchuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and Status!=2 order by CreateTime desc
select from p_myproducttemp where BranchUserId = #{branchuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and NeedVerifer=1 order by CreateTime desc
